description: This drink can be served at any time of the day and is perfect for serving during the&nbsp;summertime because it will cool you down in no time. The ingredients are simple yet give a fantastic flavor when they are combined. Read on for this delicious drink recipe!
name: Arandano Spritz

recipeInstructions.name: Muddle blueberries, lemon juice, and agave in a shaker. Add tequila and ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Muddle blueberries, lemon juice, and agave in a shaker. Add tequila and ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake and double strain into a flute. Top with Prosecco.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake and double strain into a flute. Top with Prosecco.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with fresh blueberries and lemon if desired.
